code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hourlyforecast=_ref=>{let{forecastData}=_ref;if(!forecastData||!forecastData.list){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No forecast data available."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Hourly Forecast"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:forecastData.list.slice(0,4).map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:new Date(item.dt*1000).toLocaleTimeString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperature: ",item.main.temp,"\xB0C"]})]},item.dt))})]});};export default Hourlyforecast;
